snippet: The Williams sisters have met 25 times in their professional careers, including Saturday’s semifinal at the Rogers Cup in Montreal, where Venus defeated Serena, 6-7 (2), 6-2, 6-3.
abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column notes that sisters Venus and Serena Williams have met 25 times in their professional careers, including Rogers Cup semifinal in which Venus defeated Serena; observes that such rivalry matches are becoming less frequent as Williams sisters enter later phases of their careers.
lead_paragraph: The Williams sisters have met 25 times in their professional careers, including Saturday’s semifinal at the Rogers Cup in Montreal, where Venus defeated Serena, 6-7 (2), 6-2, 6-3.

headline.main: A Chance to Relish a Sibling Rivalry Before It Fades Away
headline.print_headline: A Chance to Relish a Sibling Rivalry Before It Fades Away
